name: Open DNS - Remove Sponsored Links (June 2013)
description: Removes sponsored links for OPEN DNS Guide pages (like when name servers are down or site does not exist)..
additional_info:
/* +++ changelog +++
June 12th, 2013
- now applies to blocked-website.com
May 17th, 2012
- now applies to website-unavailable.com

- fixed, had to hide div.response as well
June 3rd, 2008
- removed new search results ads
Dec. 9th, 2007
- original release
